outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

fileReplacements.description: Replace files with other files in the build.

nextConfig.description: Path (relative to workspace root) to a function which takes phase, config, and builder options, and returns the resulting config. This is an advanced option and should not be used with a normal Next.js config file (i.e. `next.config.js`).

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.

includeDevDependenciesInPackageJson.description: Include `devDependencies` in the generated package.json file. By default only production `dependencies` are included.
